articles.title: Jennifer Lopez cancels summer tour: 'I am completely heartsick and devastated' - KABC-TV
articles.description: Jennifer Lopez has canceled her 2024 North American tour to be with her family and close friends.
articles.content:
NEW YORK -- Jennifer Lopez has canceled her 2024 North American tour, representatives for Live Nation confirmed to The Associated Press.

articles.author: Amna Nawaz, Jackson Hudgins
articles.title: New study details potential long-term health risks as American girls reach puberty earlier - PBS NewsHour
articles.description: A new study adds to the evidence that girls in America are reaching puberty earlier with potentially troubling implications for their long-term health. More girls are getting their first periods sooner than previous generations and experiencing longer periods…
articles.content:
Dr. Shruthi Mahalingaiah:
When we evaluated that exact question, we thought about, how could body mass index, particularly around the age at the first period, influence this.
